name: Kung Fu Ghost
description: Daisy inherits an estate from her late grandfather, a martial arts master. When she shows up at the property, she discovers that the house is haunted by the spirit of her grandfather and the ghost of a mysterious man: William.

review.author: garytheg
review.heading: A Fun an Engaging Film!
review.reviewBody: Kung Fu Ghost has it all -- comedy, suspense, romance, surprises, and great action sequences! Kids will especially love this movie! The director, Jennifer Linch, is also a superb actress, showing all emotions brilliantly and being very comedic as well! You will enjoy this movie.
